original_text: But the Lord has told me to say to you, ‘This is what the Lord says: I will overthrow what I have built and uproot what I have planted, throughout the earth.
korean_text: 너는 그에게 이르라 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시기를 보라 나는 내가 세운 것을 헐기도 하며 내가 심은 것을 뽑기도 하나니 온 땅에 그리하겠거늘

sentences.original_text: But the Lord has told me
This is what the Lord says
I will overthrow what I have built
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 건축한 것을 내가 무너뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and uproot what I have planted
